attributes.action: Make National Insurance contributions directly relative to a person's history of health, fitness and lifestyle rather than their level of income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Such a policy would / should act as an incentive for more people to take better care of themselves, rather than the current scheme which penalises the higher earners, regardless of their level of use of Health services and continues to support the low earners, encouraging often unhealthy lifestyles.
